name: Fruit Row
description:
Fruit Row is an intelligent game in the style of "Tetris", but in modern processing, where you have to line up the same fruit in a row to get experience points.
We all like to spend some free time playing a good game. The game "Fruit Row" will immerse you in interesting gameplay and relaxing music! Three fruits of different colors fall from above. Match the same fruits 3 in a row to get points! Classic gameplay from the video games of the 90s is presented to you with good 3D graphics and beautiful music! The game has a high score table! Compete with other players!

Key features of the game:
- 3D game style;
- Built-in high score table;
- Pleasant soundtrack.
